user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and session management.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication system that ensures customers can securely access the self-service portal using multi-factor authentication. This includes secure password management, one-time passcode functionality, and secure session handling to prevent unauthorized access. Implement encryption for all sensitive data in transit and at rest, ensuring compliance with banking security standards.

epics.title: Personalized User Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying relevant products and services.
epics.description: Design and develop a user-specific dashboard that dynamically displays personalized banking products, services, and offers based on customer profiles and eligibility. The dashboard should offer a modern, intuitive user interface with quick access to frequently used services and account insights.

epics.title: Account and Service Request Workflows
epics.summary: Build workflows for account opening and service modification requests.
epics.description: Implement end-to-end workflows allowing users to open new accounts or request modifications to existing services directly from the portal. Ensure workflows are optimized for minimal user input, with data validation and form assistance. Requests should be automatically routed to the appropriate backend system for processing.

epics.title: Real-time Notifications and Status Tracking
epics.summary: Enable real-time tracking and notifications for submitted requests.
epics.description: Develop real-time status updates allowing users to track the progress of account or service requests through the portal. Implement email and in-portal notifications for key status changes, ensuring transparency and proactive user communication.

epics.title: Interaction History and Audit Trail
epics.summary: Maintain comprehensive history of all customer interactions.
epics.description: Implement a complete log of all user activities and requests within the portal, including timestamps, action details, and request statuses. Provide users access to their interaction history, ensuring data accuracy, traceability, and compliance with audit requirements.

epics.title: Document Upload and Management
epics.summary: Allow users to upload required documentation for applications and requests.
epics.description: Add secure functionality for users to upload, manage, and view required documents as part of their account or service request workflows. Ensure the solution supports multiple file formats, virus scanning, encryption, and compliance with data retention policies.

epics.title: Draft Saving and Resume Functionality
epics.summary: Enable users to save and resume incomplete applications.
epics.description: Provide users with the capability to save partially completed applications or service requests. Implement a user-friendly way to retrieve and continue these applications later without data loss, enhancing convenience and reducing user abandonment rates.

epics.title: Responsive Design and Cross-Device Accessibility
epics.summary: Ensure consistent performance and UI across all devices.
epics.description: Develop a responsive front-end design that provides a seamless and consistent user experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Optimize layouts, load times, and navigation for various screen sizes and devices while maintaining accessibility standards.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate portal with existing core banking systems.
epics.description: Implement secure and efficient integration with the bank's core banking system to ensure real-time synchronization of customer data, account information, and service requests. Ensure APIs or middleware are utilized to handle bidirectional data flow without compromising performance or security.

epics.title: Portal Database Development and Optimization
epics.summary: Design and implement a dedicated database for portal operations.
epics.description: Develop a dedicated, high-performance database to store portal data independently of the core banking system. Optimize schema designs, caching, and indexing to ensure fast response times while maintaining data integrity, backup, and recovery capabilities.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
epics.summary: Implement role-based access to banking services and features.
epics.description: Establish a robust authorization framework that ensures users can view and access only services permitted by their roles and profiles. Define role hierarchies, permission matrices, and secure session management to ensure compliance and prevent unauthorized access across the platform.

user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to securely access the self-service portal using multi-factor authentication, so that my account remains protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure multi-factor authentication involves at least two methods of verification (e.g., password and one-time passcode).
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Multi-factor authentication must be prompted during user login.
2. The system should support generating and validating one-time passcodes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user on the login page, when credentials are entered, then a prompt for a secondary verification method is displayed.

user_stories.title: Implement Secure Session Management
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want secure session handling, so that my session remains protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Enforce secure session handling with appropriate session timeout and invalid session detection mechanisms.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Sessions must timeout after a defined period of inactivity.
2. The system should invalidate sessions immediately when a user logs out.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with an active session, when the session times out, then the user is logged out automatically.

user_stories.title: Create a Personalized Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view relevant products and services based on my profile.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should display personalized content dynamically based on user profiles and usage patterns.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The dashboard must display personalized products and services.
2. The interface should be intuitive with quick access to frequently used services.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in user, when the dashboard is displayed, then it shows personalized products and quick links based on the user's profile.

user_stories.title: Implement Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want an easy account opening workflow, so that I can open new accounts with minimal input.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The workflow must include data validation and form assistance to reduce user effort.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The workflow should minimize required user input.
2. All user inputs must be validated for accuracy.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user starting the account opening process, when the form is partly completed, then the user is assisted with data validation and form suggestions.

user_stories.title: Enable Real-time Status Tracking
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time, so that I stay informed about their progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement real-time status updates and notify users of any key status change.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users must receive real-time status updates on their requests.
2. Notifications should be sent for key status changes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with an active request, when the request status changes, then the user receives an update notification.

user_stories.title: Maintain Comprehensive Interaction History
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to access my interaction history, so that I can review all my activities and requests for accuracy.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Log all user activities and requests, including timestamps and action details, ensuring compliance and traceability.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. All user activities must be logged with detailed action information.
2. Users should be able to view their interaction history.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accessing their profile, when viewing interaction history, then a complete log of activities and requests is displayed.

user_stories.title: Implement Document Upload Functionality
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to upload required documents, so that I can complete my applications and service requests.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support multiple file formats, ensure secure uploads, and integrate virus scanning.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users must be able to upload and manage documents securely.
2. Virus scanning must be performed on all uploads.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user completing an application, when uploading a document, then the document is securely uploaded and scanned for viruses.

user_stories.title: Enable Draft Saving for Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to save and resume incomplete applications, so that I can continue them later without losing progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide intuitive draft saving and retrieval, preventing data loss.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users must be able to save incomplete applications.
2. Users should easily retrieve and continue saved drafts.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user filling out an application, when saving progress, then the draft is saved and can be resumed later.

user_stories.title: Develop a Responsive User Interface
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a consistent and optimized user experience across all devices, so that I can access the portal seamlessly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure responsive UI design supports various screen sizes, fast load times, and navigation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The portal must be fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
2. Performance and load times should be optimized.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accessing the portal on different devices, when adjusting screen size, then the interface resizes and navigates seamlessly.

user_stories.title: Integrate with Core Banking System
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want real-time synchronization of my data, so that all my account information is up-to-date.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Utilize secure APIs for real-time, bidirectional data flow without performance compromise.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Customer data must be synchronized in real-time.
2. Secure APIs should be used for data exchange.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user performing transactions, when sync is triggered, then data across the portal and core banking system is up-to-date.

architecture_generation.description: A comprehensive architecture for developing a user-friendly self-service banking portal using Azure services to ensure security, scalability, and seamless integration with the existing core banking system.
